author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 1/3 Delivered a demand to SandRidge Energy pursuant to § 220 of the Delaware General Corporation Law to inspect certain books and records.

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 2/3 Purpose is to allow investigation of management & board actions pertaining to compensation, the Bonanza transaction & the poison pill.

author: Carl_C_Icahn
content: 3/3 Read our demand letter to SandRidge Energy here: https://t.co/IK4dShatK3
